product_name: MACHyper Real Skincanvas Balm Moisturizing Cream
summary: SummaryMAC Hyper Real Skincanvas Balm Moisturizing Cream is a moisturizing cream that strengthens and protects skin's barrier for overall healthier-looking skin. Smooths skin immediately and over time while soothing and preventing visible irritation for supple, petal-soft skin with a healthy-looking glow.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight, fast-absorbing moisturizer strengthens and protects the skin barrierScience-backed and Artist-approved moisturizing cream that deeply hydrates and smooths skin immediately and over timeDeeply hydratesTHE M¬∑A¬∑C DIFFERENCEWear alone or underneath makeup for a perfectly prepped, makeup-ready complexionNon-greasy and non-pillingThe lightweight, breathable texture absorbs instantly for a smoother, better makeup applicationKeeps makeup looking fresh for 12 hoursKey IngredientsJapense Peony Extract & Ceramides: Supports and restores skin barrier strength11.5% Hyaluronic Acid Solution & 2.5% Niacinamide: Hydrates, plumps and refines the skinMango and Avocado Butters: help to leave skin feeling soft, nourished and conditionedResearch ResultsAFTER 1 USE:100% showed an immediate improvement in hydration*97% said skin felt soft and looked smoother**96% showed a fortified skin barrier*93% said skin looked more radiant**Keeps makeup looking fresh for 12 hoursAFTER 1 WEEK:99% said skin felt moisturized, soothed and protected***93% said makeup applied smoothly on top of this product****AFTER 4 WEEKS:92% said this product left skin feeling more youthful*****89% had an improvement in the appearance of skin texture*******Clinical testing on 25 panelists after one use.**Consumer testing on 180 panelists after one use.***Consumer testing on 180 panelists after one week of use, twice a day.****Consumer testing on 177 panelists after one week of use, twice a day.*****Consumer testing on 178 panelists after four weeks of use, twice a day.******Clinical testing on 38 panelists after four weeks of use, twice a day.Item 2605398How To UseApply moisturizer twice a day, morning and evening, as part of your Hyper Real skincare routine.Dispense one to two pumps directly onto fingertips or use the 001 Serum + Moisturizer Brush to apply evenly onto freshly cleansed skin, in place of your serum and moisturizer.Use the Artist-crafted Petal-Press Technique to apply by gently pressing the formula upward and outward into the skin.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Propanediol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric/Myristic/Stearic Triglyceride, Niacinamide, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Trehalose, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Squalane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cholesterol, Sodium Rna, Ceramide Ng, Acetyl Glucosamine, Acetyl Hexapeptide-8, Isononyl Isononanoate, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Caprylyl Glycol, Mangifera Indica (Mango) Seed Butter, Paeonia Albiflora Flower Extract, Crithmum Maritimum Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract, Laminaria Digitata Extract, Algae Extract, Hordeum Distichon (Barley) Extract\Extrait D'Orge √Ä Deux Rangs, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Seed Extract, Sigesbeckia Orientalis (St. Paul'S Wort) Extract, Triticum Vulgare (Wheat) Germ Oil, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Canola Oil\Huile De Colza, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Caffeine, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Sorbitan Isostearate, Potassium Cetyl Phosphate, Polysorbate 60, Hexylene Glycol, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tetrasodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Potassium Sorbate, Chlorphenesin, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: Awesome
reviews.comments:
I have Roscea, I've been using this cream for 2 weeks. I use the Aruna 77+ toner, then apply thos cream. My face looks better, it isn't as red, my skin looks healthier. I use it twice a day. My makeup goes on smooth. 

Try It!!!!!

reviews.headline: I have bought this moisturizing cream over and over.
reviews.comments: This truly is like butter. It's so soft and gentle to spread on your face.

reviews.headline: Fragranced
reviews.comments: I love the way this looks and feels. I wish Mac would make a fragrance free version as this irritates my skin. Remove the fragrance and you would have more consumers imo.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer!
reviews.comments: I really like this moisturizer. It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave a greasy feeling. I have dry skin that gets worse in the winter, but by day three, I noticed a significant improvement and felt much less dryness.

reviews.headline: So hydrating
reviews.comments: I love this moisturizer. I use it daily as my skin prep before makeup. It keeps my skin so hydrated under foundation!!

reviews.headline: Love this for a skin prep
reviews.comments: This is perfect to moisturize the skin before applying makeup. Leaves your skin glowing and hydrated before foundation

reviews.headline: Makeup Prep Perfection!
reviews.comments: This is the key to flawless makeup! I've used countless moisturizers and primers, and have never been quite happy with how my makeup blended on top. I wish I would have tried this sooner, but it was worth the wait. I have combo skin, and this is so smooth and hydrating, but not heavy or greasy. The smoothness is what makes me love how my foundation blends on top. I like a matte finish foundation, but they tend to be too drying and look dry on my skin. Not anymore! I get the smoothest, most plush looking effect from this moisturizer and my makeup looks better than ever! I highly recommend this!

reviews.headline: I like this product
reviews.comments: True to explain, stays on, I see the difference in my skin.

reviews.headline: Only moisturizer that doesn't make me break out!
reviews.comments: I have noticed a HUGE difference in fine lines! Im 29 and constantly asked if im 22!

reviews.headline: Broke out in rash
reviews.comments: Used this product for 4 days, my entire face and neck broke out in a rash. I do not recommend this product to anyone that has sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: Wanted so badly to like
reviews.comments: Im so disappointed!! I wanted so badly to love this and the serum but it just sits on my face and it pills really really bad! Ugh. Hard pass.

reviews.headline: change the packaging
reviews.comments: the product is great! the packaging is horrible. the lid crumbles and cracks and white flakes end up all over my hand and inside the lotion and then all over my face.

reviews.headline: buy it!!!
reviews.comments: you need this in your collection!

reviews.headline: Great for mature skin
reviews.comments: MAC liquid makeup is great.  I immediately felt the difference in the application.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: Makes my skin appear hydrated and more even toned. No makeup needed!

reviews.headline: pills!
reviews.comments: Ive used this on myself and on my clients & it pilled. ive tried using a heavy layer and a light layer and it still pills & flakes.

reviews.headline: Must have for make-up
reviews.comments: This is the BEST creation from MAC for a flawless finish when you apply your makeup! It's a must-have for me along with the serumizer üíï

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Amazing! Very hydrating.

reviews.headline: LOVE this. will always repurchase.
reviews.comments: This moisturizer is hands down one of my favorites before applying makeup or even just on its own. It works so well under makeup & smells so good

reviews.headline: Hydrating
reviews.comments:
This cream is hydrating even for dry skin ! It gets absorbed quickly, doesn't feel greasy! But I did not like the smell at all ! And the smell lingered on‚Ä¶
I did end up returning this face cream!

Helps to moisturise my face  during this season

media.headline: First cream I've been able to use in years!
A must have in everyone's skincare regime!
Hyper Real Review
media.caption: MAC Cosmetics Skincanvas Balm Moisturizing Cream

faceoff_positive.comments: I received this Mac hyper real skin canvas balm as a complimentary gift. I was extremely excited for this as I loved the cleansing oil from this line. The product comes in a sleek glass jar that has gold glitter detail. Once I opened the jar, I immediately could smell the Japanese peony extract and mango butter. It smells so fruity and delightful. The balm itself is very thick. I applied a dab on my forehead, checks, and chin. It spread well although you definitely need to work it gently on your face to get it to thin out. I can't emphasize enough how good this smells. It isn't overwhelming but it's strong at the same time. I could smell it hours after application and just loved it. My skin felt very hydrated by the balm. It was not oily and it absorbed very well into my skin. I didn't feel like I had anything on (other than the fact that my skin felt really plump and soothed). It was thick but not heavy. It definitely did not just sit on top of my skin. My skin just drank it up instantly. My face felt super smooth and any dry spots that existed were completely gone. I have oily skin and was so happy to find out this went well as a night cream and as a day cream. It didn't cause my skin to be any oilier than it normally is even though it was a thick, balmy consistency. Additionally, the ingredients are just amazing. It contains hyaluronic acid to keep your skin youthful and niacinamide to help even out your skin tone and texture. This product is insanely good and considering the $22 price point, it's just perfect. I will purchase this time and time again and will also recommend this to everyone. Simply, in love with this!
faceoff_positive.headline: Insanely Great

faceoff_negative.comments: This moisturizer seemed like it could be a good fit at first, but once I applied it to my skin, it felt really heavy and left a residue that ended up pilling off all of my skincare products. I absolutely hate when this happens. I tried using it over the course of two weeks in different ways and in conjunction with different products (the accompanying skincare line, by itself, with my other skincare products) and it just didn't work for me. It does not absorb quickly and it leaves somewhat of a residue. Even when I used it only with the cleansing oil and moisturizer in the same skincare line, all of the products seemed to be too heavy for my skin. They all didn't fully absorb. My skin type is normal/dry. These products aren't the best for layering with other products. Several times I've had to re-wash my face and completely restart my skincare routine due to pilling. They all had a nice scent.
faceoff_negative.headline: Heavy. Pulling. Not good for layering
